description: Sully.ai is an all-in-one AI Medical Assistant designed to save doctors' time by helping them with time-consuming tasks performed before, during, and after patient visits.
title: Sully.ai - The #1 all-in-one AI solution in saving doctors' time
introduction: Sully.ai is an AI-driven solution designed to assist doctors by automating administrative tasks, thereby freeing up valuable time for patient care. It offers features like real-time decision support, medical note transcription, accurate diagnosis, and custom workflow automations.
features: Screening: Receive the latest symptoms directly from patients.
Decision Support: Support decision-making in real-time.
Scribe: Turn conversations into medical notes seamlessly with AI.
Diagnosis: Assists doctors with creating an accurate diagnosis of symptoms.
Clinical Plan: Crafts a plan for the case once a diagnosis is generated.
Automations: Create custom automations to speed up any workflow.
Hyper Personalization: Personalized for each physician at scale.
Supports 19 languages: Multilingual support for diverse linguistic backgrounds.
HIPAA Compliant Infrastructure: 100% HIPAA compliant with industry-standard data encryption and secure storage.

faqs.question: How does Sully.ai help doctors?
faqs.answer: Sully.ai automates administrative tasks, supports real-time decision-making, transcribes medical notes, assists with accurate diagnosis, and creates custom workflow automations.

faqs.question: Is Sully.ai HIPAA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sully.ai is 100% HIPAA compliant with industry-standard data encryption and secure storage.

faqs.question: What languages does Sully.ai support?
faqs.answer: Sully.ai supports 19 languages, enabling effective communication with patients from diverse linguistic backgrounds.

faqs.question: How much time can Sully.ai save doctors daily?
faqs.answer: Sully.ai can save doctors an average of 2.8 hours daily, one week after using the platform.

faqs.question: What kind of personalization does Sully.ai offer?
faqs.answer: Sully.ai offers hyper personalization, allowing doctors to customize the AI through voice or natural language to tailor their entire environment.
